meanings.definition: A marine animal with a soft body and tentacles.
meanings.sent1: The polypuses gracefully swam through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of polypuses at the aquarium.
meanings.sent3: The polypuses had a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The polypuses danced like graceful underwater ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful polypuses captured the attention of the divers.

meanings.sent1: There were many polypuses in the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The polypuses were carefully studied by scientists.
meanings.sent3: The polypuses gathered for a meeting to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent4: The polypuses stood out in a sea of other creatures.
meanings.sent5: The polypuses were a sight to behold in their natural habitat.
